descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: 108-1, 108-2, 108-3. Elementary Polish I, II, III. This course series teaches students to speak, read, and write in Polish, as well as familiarizes them with Polish culture. It employs the most up-to-date techniques of language teaching (e.g. communicative and accelerated learning, and learning based on students' native language skills), as well as multileveled target-language exposure.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Required materials: M. Malolepsza & A. Szymkiewicz, "Hurra po polsku 1" (book, CD, student's workbook); D. Bielec "Basic Polish: A Grammar and Workbook." Autumn, Winter, Spring.
